result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Russell Dean Lawrence

records.addlTxt: on record 10/5. kma

9:31 AM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K Kittel.  Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court with defendant Russell Dean Lawrence. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG to all counts.  Waives speedy trial. Atty Bjork has Discovery, waiting on a formal offer. Atty Rockow notes this matter will be assigned to a new DA who will have to extend any offer. Court confirms address of DE. Adjourned: 9:33 am
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Settlement conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Settlement conference on October 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:42 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Benoy  Defendant Russell Dean Lawrence III in court.  Attorney John P Bjork in court for Russell Dean Lawrence III.  Attorney Aaron Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.   State calls Hudson PD Officer Tyler Hiller.  Witness sworn.  State direct.  Cross.  Redirect.  Witness identifies DE.  Witness excused.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Bond continues.  Atty Bjork questions keys being returned. Atty Bjork to follow up with Atty Rockow.  Adjourned: 11:26
Arraignment scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Arraignment on October 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.

1:27 PM CO: TCH for RMW, RPR: Melstrom, Clerk: Fox, Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney A. Dolfi in court for Defendant for today. Defendant Russell Dean Lawrence III in court. Def had the wrong court date written down for missed court date. Court reinstates bond.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 29, 2022 at 11:15 am.

11:35 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel.. Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Russell Dean Lawrence III. Defendant Russell Dean Lawrence III not in court. Officer present to testify. Set for PH. Clerk called hall, DE not in zoom. Atty Bjork in unaware of DE's whereabouts. Atty Rockow as for body only, extraditable, adjoining states. Atty Bjork asks for stayed warrant. Adjourned: 11:38 am.
Return on warrant scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 01:05 pm.

Attorney John P Bjork appeared by video w/Russell Dean Lawrence III who also appeared by video. Court notes Atty Bjork has been assigned to the case, PH needs to be set. Atty Bjork is waiving time limits on the PH. Court advises DE of his right to be in person for this hearing. DE would like to proceed via zoom. Court confirms address of DE. Bond continues in form and amount. Adjourned:  9:53 am.

records.addlTxt:
9:31 AM  Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: Unmonitored DAR, Clerk: Benoy   Defendant Russell Dean Lawrence III not in court.  Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Originally set for Preliminary hearing.  Court issues warrant - adjoining States.  Case recalled: 9:44   DE Russell Lawrence III now appears.  Court quashes warrant.  Court questions Atty status.  Does not qualify for PD. DF will fill out Court Appointed Atty paperwork today.  Court finds good cause to extend time for preliminary hearing. STC to be set to see if Atty is assigned. Adjourned: 9:47
Status conference scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status conference on August 29, 2022 at 09:45 am.
22R 011023.  Posted by K. Gregory. bph  $250
filed by VW. bph

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

- No unauthorized possession of dangerous weapons. 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Fleet Farm- Hudson, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

Defendant Russell Dean Lawrence appeared by video, in custody. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. Waives reading. Court advises of charges. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets PH. Adjourned
